title: InvokeHostFunctionResult
description:
InvokeHostFunctionResult is an XDR Union defines as:

```text union InvokeHostFunctionResult switch (InvokeHostFunctionResultCode code) { case INVOKE_HOST_FUNCTION_SUCCESS: Hash success; // sha256(InvokeHostFunctionSuccessPreImage) case INVOKE_HOST_FUNCTION_MALFORMED: case INVOKE_HOST_FUNCTION_TRAPPED: case INVOKE_HOST_FUNCTION_RESOURCE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: case INVOKE_HOST_FUNCTION_ENTRY_ARCHIVED: case INVOKE_HOST_FUNCTION_INSUFFICIENT_REFUNDABLE_FEE: void; }; ```
